casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Goode, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Goode (1998), 84 Ohio St.3d 15.]

(Nos. 98-934 and 98-960 Submitted October 13, 1998 Decided November 25, 1998.) David H. Bodiker, Ohio Public Defender, and Robert L. Lane, Chief Appellate Counsel, for appellant.

*16The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Cook (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 404, 700 N.E.2d 570.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
